coreAttributes.name: bandana
coreAttributes.description: A square piece of cloth, which can be folded and tied to form a cover for the wearer's head, neck, or face.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] the bandana over [npc.her] [npc.face], before reaching back and tying the ends together.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] the bandana over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.face], before reaching back and tying the ends together.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(push)] the bandana over [npc2.namePos] [npc2.face], before reaching back and tying the ends together.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc.her] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc2.namePos] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc.her] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] bandana so that it's no longer covering [npc.her] mouth.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] bandana so that it's no longer covering [npc2.her] mouth
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] bandana so that it's no longer covering [npc2.her] mouth

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up [npc.her] bandana so that it's once again covering [npc.her] mouth.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up [npc2.namePos] bandana so that it's once again covering [npc2.her] mouth
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] up [npc2.namePos] bandana so that it's once again covering [npc2.her] mouth

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] the bandana over the top of [npc.her] head, before reaching back and tying the ends together.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] the bandana over the top of [npc2.namePos] head, before reaching back and tying the ends together.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(push)] the bandana over the top of [npc2.namePos] head, before reaching back and tying the ends together.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc.her] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc2.namePos] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc.her] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] the bandana over the top of [npc.her] head, before reaching back and tying the ends together.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] the bandana over the top of [npc2.namePos] head, before reaching back and tying the ends together.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(push)] the bandana over the top of [npc2.namePos] head, before reaching back and tying the ends together.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc.her] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc2.namePos] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc.her] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the bandana loosely around [npc.her] neck, before reaching back and tying the ends together.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the bandana loosely around [npc2.namePos] neck, before reaching back and tying the ends together.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc.her] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc2.namePos] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the ends of [npc.her] bandana and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
